content: this bookmark has 22 row and measures about 5 for this pattern i used the same textured hearts that are in the sweetheart soiree 1 doily pattern but instead of working in rounds they are worked in row pattern is written using u s terminology ***materials needed*** * size 10 thread- 30-40 yards * 1 75 mm hook * yarn needle * scissors additional materials for the tassel- * a piece of cardboard * a book or flat heavy object * optional- comb * optional- pliers **special stitches** * 2-fpdc decrease * 2-bpdc decrease * 4-fpdc decrease * picot * large picot 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/sweetheart-soiree
